translations: 哈里发（伊斯兰教的国王）

sentences.sentence: SB 14 is in flight test at Edwards Air Force Base, Calif., and will be delivered to the Air Force in 2011.
sentences.translation: SB 14 轰炸机在加利福尼亚州爱德华兹空军基地进行飞行测试，并将于2011年交付空军。

sentences.sentence: "Men will talk when there's nothing left to lose, " says Susan Pease Gadoua, a therapist in San Rafael, Calif.
sentences.translation: “男人们只有在走投无路的时候才会吐露心声。”加州圣拉斐尔市的临床医师苏珊·皮斯·加杜阿表示。

sentences.sentence: Many of the aspects of home buying aren't a consideration for children, said Tracey Hampson, a real estate agent based in Santa Clarita, Calif.
sentences.translation: 加州圣塔克拉利塔的房地产经纪人特蕾西·汉普森说，买房时，很多方面孩子们都没有考虑到。
